attributes.action: Build more speed bumps in all south lanarkshire streets
attributes.additional_details: All streets in south lanarkshire should hve speed bumps because a lot of cars are speeding past my street and my friend has been hit by a car and my cat has been killed by a car both in burnblea street, please sign this petition

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Scottish Government (which has a separate petitions system).
